channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Anarchist’s Conviction Offers a Grim Foreshadowing of Trump’s War on the ‘Left’
item.description: As the Trump administration ramps up its targeting of left-leaning people and groups, the prosecution and harsh sentencing of Casey Goonan may provide...

item.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
item.description: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel? And how does it make others feel ...

item.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
item.description: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel? And how does it make others feel ...

item.title: The Curious Case of the Bizarre, Disappearing Captcha
item.description: While puzzling captchas—from dogs in hats to sliding jockstraps—still exist, most bot-deterring challenges have vanished into the background.

item.title: LG founder’s grandson, production firm partner up to bring AI to filmmaking
item.description: Brian Koo’s Stock Farm Road and Utopai Studios have partnered up to form Utopai East, an AI-powered film production company.

item.title: Hack Exposes Kansas City’s Secret Police Misconduct List
item.description: A major breach of the Kansas City, Kansas, Police Department reveals, for the first time, a list of alleged officer misconduct including dishonesty, s...

item.title: Microsoft’s $15.2B UAE investment turns Gulf State into test case for US AI diplomacy
item.description: For the first time, the U.S. has granted Microsoft a license to export Nvidia chips to the UAE – a move that positions the country as both a proving g...

item.title: Microsoft inks $9.7B deal with Australia’s IREN for AI cloud capacity
item.description: The deal will give Microsoft access to compute infrastructure built with Nvidia's GB300 GPUs, which will be deployed over phases through 2026.

item.title: OpenAI and Amazon ink $38B cloud computing deal

item.title: 15 Best Travel Toiletry Bags, Tested Over Many Miles (2025)
item.description: Our team evaluated a ton of toiletry bags to find the best storage, organization, and design options for all your essentials.
